markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Fumeiyoshi (Lord of Envy)](/Deities.aspx?ID=175)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Tian Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=16)

**Edicts** Punish those who have good fortune they don't deserve, devour the pleasures of the living, encourage resentment, make graveyards supernaturally unsafe

**Anathema** Pass by food without stealing a bite, allow honor or tradition to prevent you from taking what you want

**Follower Alignments**
LE, NE, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7)

**Favored Weapon** [Naginata](/Weapons.aspx?ID=297)

**Domains** [Ambition](/Domains.aspx?ID=1), [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=8), [Earth](/Domains.aspx?ID=10), [Undeath](/Domains.aspx?ID=34)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Grim Tendrils](/Spells.aspx?ID=141)

- **2nd**
[Feast of Ashes](/Spells.aspx?ID=575)

- **7th**
[Possession](/Spells.aspx?ID=225)

</column>
name: Fumeiyoshi (Lord of Envy)
